name: 10,000 Hours
blurb: Help fund a blogging experiment exploring what can be accomplished in 10,000 hours of video game design!

rewards.reward: No Reward
You get to be on the Wall of Shame, listed somewhere for all to see in at least one of our games.
Pick five friends to be on the Wall of Shame, listed somewhere for all to see in at least one of our games.
